alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Mathews; Northampton; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Northampton, southeastern York, and southern Mathews Counties, the City of Poquoson and the City of Hampton through 900 PM EDT... At 816 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bavon to 7 miles east of Seaford to Langley AFB. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hampton University around 825 PM EDT. Grand View, Buckroe Beach and Fort Monroe around 830 PM EDT. Cape Charles, Cheriton and Bay View around 900 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Capeville, Kiptopeke State Park, Fox Hill, Phoebus, Langley View, Peary, Simpkins, Townsend, Oyster and Kiptopeke. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; Mathews; Northampton; York
